channel.title: Camelot PK [317] [OldSchool PKing] [KillStreaks, LeaderBoards, clans and more]
channel.description:
[center]Index - [url=http://www.camelot-pk.webs.com]www.camelot-pk.webs.com[/url] Play Now - [url=http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now]http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now[/url] Forums - [url=http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/[/url][/center] [center][size=18pt][b]-Intro-[/b][/size][/center] [center]We all remember and love the Cammy PvP source, for me it holds a special place in my RsPs journey in that I think that it was a turning point on the way that people view Private Servers. Cammy PvP was one of the most fun servers I have played to this day. This source was a major throwback for me and I feel that I have done enough work to this server to where other people might enjoy it too.[/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]-Information-[/b][/size][/center] [center]-New Models have been added to the client ( Dragon Claws, AGS, Bandos Models, Godsword Models, Colored Whips ect. ) -Counting IP's for those who Multi Log for PKP or Killstreak Count -A new point Store using special Shop Values -100% Finished Pest Control -Clan Creating, Clan Joining, Clan Leaving, and Clan Waring are all refurbished and working. -Cleaned out the Client.java file as it was disgusting ( remember this is a delta ) ( Deleted useless methods, Took out half of the skilling data as it is not needed, ect ) -Correct Animations for : Godswords, Claws, Whips, Most Dragon Weapons, also added specials to the listed items. -New Hit Splats. -Up-To-Date items -Public messaging system along with Yell Command -Lottery System using PkP as a currency -Removed Rights to hold certain weapons -Added new PkP Shop[/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]-Media-[/b][/size][/center]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9xzHW/4993dac7d2.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9xzQx/9c99f04ace.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9xzR8/5b387ae96a.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9xzWN/dd643500ba.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9xBou/74ad25fff3.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9xAuL/e339301968.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9z9ze/82557efaed.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9z9zZ/6a4b345b46.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9z9AP/a30812d454.jpg[/img] [/center]
[center]Index - [url=http://www.camelot-pk.webs.com]www.camelot-pk.webs.com[/url] Play Now - [url=http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now]http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now[/url] Forums - [url=http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/[/url][/center]

item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[center]Index - www.camelot-pk.webs.com
Play Now - http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now
Forums - http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/[/center]
[center][size=18pt]-Intro-[/size][/center]
[center]We all remember and love the Cammy PvP source, for me it holds a special place in my RsPs journey in that I think that it was a turning point on the way that people view Private Servers. Cammy PvP was one of the most fun servers I have played to this day. This source was a major throwback for me and I feel that I have done enough work to this server to where other people might enjoy it too.[/center]

[center][size=18pt]-Information-[/size][/center]
[center]-New Models have been added to the client ( Dragon Claws, AGS, Bandos Models, Godsword Models, Colored Whips ect. )
-Counting IPâ€™s for those who Multi Log for PKP or Killstreak Count
-A new point Store using special Shop Values
-100% Finished Pest Control
-Clan Creating, Clan Joining, Clan Leaving, and Clan Waring are all refurbished and working.
-Cleaned out the Client.java file as it was disgusting ( remember this is a delta ) ( Deleted useless methods, Took out half of the skilling data as it is not needed, ect )
-Correct Animations for : Godswords, Claws, Whips, Most Dragon Weapons, also added specials to the listed items.
-New Hit Splats.
-Up-To-Date items
-Public messaging system along with Yell Command
-Lottery System using PkP as a currency
-Removed Rights to hold certain weapons
-Added new PkP Shop[/center]

[center][size=18pt]-Media-[/size][/center]

[center]








[/center]

[center]Index - www.camelot-pk.webs.com
Play Now - http://camelot-pk.webs.com/play-now
Forums - http://camelot-pk.webs.com/apps/forums/[/center]
